articles.title: 'Occupy ICE' Protesters Shut Down Manhattan Immigration Hearings
articles.description: The protest and ongoing occupation of an ICE building in lower Manhattan has caused federal immigration authorities to halt some operations at the facility, including all bond hearings scheduled for Monday at the Varick Street Immigration Court. [ more › ]
